default.value: After Cognition: Human Value in the Age of Irreducibility - philosophical thesis exploring how human value concentrates in three irreducible domains (Presence, Cohesion, Meaning) as AI commoditizes cognitive labor

Value Concentration Hypothesis: human value concentrates in irreducible domains. Ástrós Paradox: using AI to reveal what AI cannot do. Three domains: Presence (embodied consciousness), Cohesion (intersubjective trust), Meaning (narrative identity). Cultivation Economy: post-AI economic model.
